parameters.name: messages
parameters.value: =[{"role": "system", "content": "You are a customer support ticket analyzer. Analyze the ticket and return ONLY a JSON object with urgency (low/medium/high/critical) and sentiment (positive/neutral/negative). Example: {\"urgency\": \"high\", \"sentiment\": \"negative\"}"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Ticket: " + $json.subject + "\n\nDescription: " + $json.description}]

parameters.notes: AI agent that analyzes customer support tickets to categorize urgency (low/medium/high/critical) and sentiment (positive/neutral/negative) for automated routing and prioritization

options.systemMessage: You are an expert customer support agent analyzer. Your job is to process support tickets and provide clear recommendations for team assignment and priority handling.

parameters.notes: Routes support tickets to appropriate teams based on AI categorization and keywords
Send Slack notifications for customer support tickets with different priority levels based on urgency and sentiment analysis
parameters.channel: ={% set urgency = JSON.parse($('AI Ticket Categorization').item.json.choices[0].message.content).urgency %}{% if urgency == 'critical' %}#support-critical{% elif urgency == 'high' %}#support-urgent{% else %}#support-general{% endif %}

buildPhases.description: Webhook endpoint receives incoming customer support tickets via HTTP POST requests. Configured with error handling to gracefully process tickets and continue workflow execution.
AI-powered ticket analysis using OpenAI API to categorize urgency levels and sentiment analysis. Includes automatic retry logic with up to 5 attempts for resilient processing.
Smart routing system that assigns tickets to appropriate teams based on keywords and AI categorization results. Routes to billing, technical, escalation, or general support teams.
Priority-based Slack notifications sent to different channels based on urgency levels. Critical tickets go to #support-critical, high urgency to #support-urgent, others to #support-general.

parameters.text: {{$json.ticket_content || $json.description || $json.message}}
parameters.systemMessage:
You are a customer support ticket analysis assistant. Analyze the provided ticket content and return a JSON response with the following structure:

{
  "urgency": "low|medium|high|critical",
  "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "reasoning": "Brief explanation of the categorization"
}

Urgency Guidelines:
- Critical: System down, security breach, data loss
- High: Major feature broken, multiple users affected
- Medium: Single user issue, feature request with business impact
- Low: General questions, minor bugs, documentation requests

Sentiment Guidelines:
- Positive: Customer is satisfied, complimentary
- Neutral: Factual reporting, standard requests
- Negative: Frustrated, angry, disappointed tone

Extract relevant keywords that could help with team assignment (e.g., "billing", "technical", "account", "bug", "feature").

parameters.content:
## üì• Triggers
Webhook endpoint receives incoming customer support tickets via HTTP POST requests. Configured with error handling to gracefully process tickets and continue workflow execution.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Transform
AI-powered ticket analysis using OpenAI API to categorize urgency levels and sentiment analysis. Includes automatic retry logic with up to 5 attempts for resilient processing.

## üöÄ Outputs
Smart routing system that assigns tickets to appropriate teams based on keywords and AI categorization results. Routes to billing, technical, escalation, or general support teams.

Priority-based Slack notifications sent to different channels based on urgency levels. Critical tickets go to #support-critical, high urgency to #support-urgent, others to #support-general.
